name: 古碧源
objective:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:
1. Introduction to bench instruments : oscilloscope, function generator, power supply, digital multimeter.
2. Diode circuits : voltage-current characteristics, rectification, filtering, limiting and clamping, and zener diode.
3. Operational amplifier circuits : inverting and non-inverting, arithmetic circuit, voltage follower, integration and differentiation, instrument amplification.
4. Transistor: voltage-current characteristics, voltage transfer characteristic, biasing, various amplifier configurations.
5. Frequency response of amplifiers, multi-stage and cascade amplifiers, differential amplifiers, feedback amplifiers, power amplifiers.
schedule:
Week01~03: Course description and Instruments function introduction.
Week04~06: Diode Circuits
Week07~08: Operational Amplifier Circuits
Week09      : Mid-term exam
Week10~12: Op-Amp application circuits
Week13~15: Bipolar Junction Transistor Characteristics
Week16~17: Transistor Amplifier Circuits
Week18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Experimental Results : 60 %
Mid-term and Final exams : 30 %
Attendance : 10 %
materials: The instructor will prepare experiment handouts in English for all experiments that suits your Electronics class. The handouts will be passed out at the beginning of each experiment. However, the students should study related materials in the textbook of their Electronics course.

covid19.lv2Description: The laboratory has 24 benches, and can have students work in sufficient social distance from each other. So experiments are still done in the laboratory in case of COVID-19 Level 2 Alert. In the worst case of Level 3 Alert the instructor will perform experiment in the laboratory and students attend the class on-line. Then students send their reports by emails for grading.
covid19.courseScoreMethod: All experiment reports should be prepared electronically, and submit to the instructor by emails to present spreading of COVID virus. In the case of Level 1 and Level 2 Alert students will fill in their mid-term and final exams in paper.
covid19.courseInfo: Please join the class on Google Meet for the first week. After the first week the instructor will decide whether have students come to the laboratory due to the small enrollment of this course.
covid19.contactInfo: All students can find contact info of the instructor in the Department of Electrical Engineering official website.
covid19.additionalInfo: Please be prepared to attend the first week classes until noon. The instructor will give a full 3-hour instructions on bench instruments. Believe me, you do not want to miss any one class, or you will not be able to catch up with the class.
